name: Pickle Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka and pickle juice to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice
2. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until frosty
3. Strain into a Martini glass
4. Garnish with a dill pickle spear, and serve

name: Tequila Espresso Martini
instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add all the ingredients
3. Cap the shaker and shake vigorously for 20 seconds
4. Strain the mixture into two chilled Martini glasses using a cocktail strainer
5. Garnish each glass with three coffee beans
6. Serve and enjoy!

name: Cinnamon Espresso Martini
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty
3. Fine strain into a coupe glass
4. Garnish with three espresso beans, and serve

name: Rome with a View
instructions: 1. Add the Campari, dry vermouth, lime juice and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker
2. Add ice and shake until chilled
3. Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice
4. Top with soda and garnish with an orange wheel

name: Beetlejuice Margarita
instructions: 1. Add the tequila, apple sour pucker, melon liqueur and lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty
3. Decant into your serving glass (optionally rimmed with raspberry syrup, and filled with blueberry-studded ice)

name: Vampire’s Kiss

ingredients.name: Grenadine and granulated sugar for the rim

instructions: 1. In a cocktail shaker, combine vodka, raspberry liqueur, cranberry juice, lemon juice, and grenadine
2. Add two handfuls of ice and shake until well chilled.
3. Prepare your glass by rimming it with grenadine and granulated sugar for an eerie, blood-like effect.
4. Strain into your prepared glass.
5. For an extra spooky vibe, add a small piece of dry ice to the glass – just be sure to wait until it fully dissolves before drinking. More info HERE.

name: Coconut Margarita
instructions: 1. In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, cream of coconut, Grand Marnier, and lime juice, and shake to combine
2. Rim your serving glasses with lime juice and toasted coconut, then add ice
3. Strain the cocktail into the prepared
4. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve

name: Mezcal Old Fashioned

ingredients.name: Luxardo cherry and orange twist, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the simple syrup and bitters to an Old Fashioned glass
2. Fill the glass with ice
3. Squeeze the orange peel over the glass, and drop it in
4. Add the mezcal and tequila
5. Stir until the drink is chilled
6. Garnish with a cherry to serve

name: Smoked Old Fashioned

ingredients.name: Orange peel and Luxardo cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the simple syrup, bitters and bourbon to a rocks glass
2. Add ice cubes
3. Stir until properly chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Fill the glass with smoke, and keep covered for two minutes
5. Release the smoke
6. Garnish with an orange peel and Luxardo cherry

name: Tequila Negroni recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and serve

name: Clementine Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka, orange liqueur, clementine juice, and lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty
3. Strain into a Martini glass, and serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Horchata
instructions: 1. Blend the rice, almonds, and cinnamon sticks in a blender or food processor along with the 4 cups of hot water until smooth
2. Let it sit for four hours or overnight
3. Strain the mixture through cheesecloth, into a pitcher
4. Stir in the milk, sugar, and vanilla extract (adjust sugar to taste)
5. Chill and serve over ice

name: Pickle Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka and pickle juice to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice
2. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until frosty
3. Strain into a Martini glass
4. Garnish with a dill pickle spear, and serve

2. Add all the ingredients
3. Cap the shaker and shake vigorously for 20 seconds
4. Strain the mixture into two chilled Martini glasses using a cocktail strainer
5. Garnish each glass with three coffee beans
6. Serve and enjoy!

2. Rim your serving glasses with lime juice and toasted coconut, then add ice
3. Strain the cocktail into the prepared
4. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve

instructions: 1. Add the simple syrup and bitters to an Old Fashioned glass
2. Fill the glass with ice
3. Squeeze the orange peel over the glass, and drop it in
4. Add the mezcal and tequila
5. Stir until the drink is chilled
6. Garnish with a cherry to serve

ingredients.name: Orange peel and Luxardo cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the simple syrup, bitters and bourbon to a rocks glass
2. Add ice cubes
3. Stir until properly chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Fill the glass with smoke, and keep covered for two minutes
5. Release the smoke
6. Garnish with an orange peel and Luxardo cherry

name: Tequila Negroni recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and serve

name: Clementine Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka, orange liqueur, clementine juice, and lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty
3. Strain into a Martini glass, and serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Horchata
instructions: 1. Blend the rice, almonds, and cinnamon sticks in a blender or food processor along with the 4 cups of hot water until smooth
2. Let it sit for four hours or overnight
3. Strain the mixture through cheesecloth, into a pitcher
4. Stir in the milk, sugar, and vanilla extract (adjust sugar to taste)
5. Chill and serve over ice

name: Tomato Martini

ingredients.name: Basil leaves (plus a few more for garnish)

instructions: 1. Muddle the basil leaves in a cocktail shaker
2. Add the vodka, tomato juice, salt, and ice
3. Shake until chilled
4. Strain into a Martini glass, and garnish with basil leaves if preferred

name: Italian Paloma
instructions: 1. Add the Campari, grapefruit juice, lemon juice, lime juice, and agave nectar to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty, strain into the serving glass over fresh ice
3. Top off with Italian orange soda
4. Add a pinch of salt, and garnish with a grapefruit twist

name: Mezcal Paloma
instructions: 1. Rim a serving glass with lime juice and coarse sea salt
2. Add the mezcal, grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and fresh lime to a cocktail shaker with ice
3. Shake until frosty, strain into the serving glass over fresh ice
4. Top off with club soda, garnish with a fresh wedge of lime, and serve

name: Paloma Mocktail
instructions: 1. Rim a serving glass with lime juice and coarse sea salt
2. Add the grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and fresh lime to a cocktail shaker with ice
3. Shake until frosty, strain into the serving glass over fresh ice
4. Top off with club soda, garnish with a fresh wedge of lime, and serve

name: Spicy Paloma
instructions: 1. Rim a tall glass with lime juice and Tajin spice
2. Add the tequila, lime juice, and jalapeño simple syrup to a cocktail shaker with ice
3. Shake until frosty, and strain into a serving glass over fresh ice
4. Top with grapefruit soda, and garnish with a fresh wedge of lime

name: Test Pilot Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all ingredients to a blender with a cup of ice and blend at high speed for 5 seconds (the ice should be crushed but not smooth)
2. Pour into a double rocks glass, adding more crushed ice to fill if required

name: Rum Paloma
instructions: 1. Rim a tall glass with lime juice and coarse sea salt
2. Fill it with ice, and add the rum, grapefruit soda and fresh lime juice
3. Garnish with a fresh wedge of lime, and serve

name: Pomegranate Rosé Paloma
instructions: 1. Fill a serving glass with ice
2. Add the pomegranate juice, grapefruit soda and sparkling rosé wine
3. Gently stir the ingredients to combine
4. Add a few pomegranate arils as garnish.

name: Pineapple Paloma
instructions: 1. Add the tequila, pineapple juice and lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty, strain into a serving glass over fresh ice, and garnish with a pineapple wedge

name: Pot o' Gold
instructions: 1. Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker without ice, and dry shake to combine
2. Then add ice, and shake until frosty
3. Fine strain it into a serving glass, and garnish with an edible gold leaf

name: Cherry Moon Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice and add the SKYY Infusion Cherry Vodka
2. Add the lemon-lime soda, then top with the grenadine
3. Garnish with a cherry, and serve

name: Brandy Milk Punch
instructions: 1. Add the brandy, rum, milk, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker (without ice) and shake well
2. Add the egg white, vanilla, and ice, and shake very well
3. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice
4. Garnish with a grating of fresh nutmeg and serve

name: Red Snapper Cocktail

ingredients.name: Dashes of Tabasco sauce (or your preferred hot sauce)
Dashes of Worcestershire sauce (or vegan alternative)
Pinch of salt (or celery salt if you prefer)
Old Bay seasoning to rim your glass (optional)

instructions: 1. Add some Old Bay seasoning to a plate
2. Run a lemon wedge along the outer rim of your glass, then dip it into the seasoning, fill with ice, and set aside

3. Build all the ingredients in a large mixing glass and add ice, pour it into your cocktail shaker, and then back into your glass. Repeat, and then once it’s back in the cocktail shaker, strain the Red Snapper into your prepared glass, and serve

name: Rum Old Fashioned
instructions: 1. Add the white and dark rum, falernum, simple syrup and bitters to a mixing glass with ice
2. Stir to combine and fine-strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice
3. Garnish with an orange peel twist

name: Love and Murder Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty, and fine-strain into a chilled serving glass

name: Strawberry Shortcake Daiquiri

ingredients.name: Whipped cream and a fresh strawberry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the thawed frozen strawberries, amaretto liqueur, vanilla ice cream, vanilla extract, crushed ice, and SKYY Vanilla Vodka into a blender
2. Cover and blend until smooth
3. Pour into a glass and garnish with whipped cream and a fresh strawberry

name: Affogato Martini
instructions: 1. Add the cold espresso, vodka, coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake for about 30 seconds until nice and frosty
3. Strain into a Martini or coupe glass
4. Top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream
5. Garnish with chocolate shavings and serve immediately

name: Gingerbread Martini

ingredients.name: Maple syrup for rimming the glass

instructions: 1. Add some maple syrup to a bowl that will fit the rim of your glass
2. Add the crushed gingerbread to another bowl
3. Dip the rim of a coupe glass into the maple syrup, and then into the crushed biscuits to coat, then pop the glass into the freezer to chill
4. To make the cocktail, add the vodka, Irish cream liqueur, amaretto and half-and-half to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
5. Shake the cocktail for about 30 seconds, or until the shaker is frosty on the outside
6. Strain into your chilled coupe glass and serve with gingerbread on the side

name: Hazelnut Espresso Martini
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until frosty (about 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
4. Garnish by placing three roasted coffee beans on top of the foam
5. Serve!

name: Spiced Cranberry Paloma

ingredients.name: Sugared cranberries and a sprig of rosemary to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the tequila, orange liqueur, grapefruit juice, cranberry sauce and a squeeze of lime to a highball glass
2. Stir to combine, then add ice
3. Top with ginger beer
4. Garnish with sugared cranberries and a sprig of rosemary

name: Jumpin' Jack Flash
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake for at least 30 seconds, until the shaker is ice cold and frosty on the outside
3. Strain into a chilled Martini glass
4. Garnish with a pineapple wedge
5. Serve

name: Peppermint White Russian Mocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a lowball glass with ice
2. Pour the cold brewed coffee over the ice
3. Add the vanilla and peppermint extracts
4. Float the cream over the coffee, and stir very gently
5. Add a peppermint candy cane as garnish and enjoy!

name: Roy Rogers Drink
instructions: 1. Pour the grenadine into a Collins glass with ice
2. Top with the cola, and gently stir to combine
3. Garnish with a single maraschino cherry, and serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Mulled Wine
instructions: 1. Add the juices, sugar and blackberries to a saucepan and bring to a simmer
2. Add the spices and orange slice and keep simmering gently
3. Taste and adjust for sweetness
4. Strain into a heatproof container and enjoy in heatproof mugs or glasses

name: Cherry Punch Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the teabags and spices to a large pot
2. Pour in the boiling water
3. Steep for 10 minutes
4. Add the orange and cherry juice along with some of the fruit pieces, keeping some aside to garnish
5. Put to pot over a low temperature and gently heat the tea for 5 minutes
6. Remove from the heat and ladle into mugs
7. Stir through some honey if desired, garnish with fruit and serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Mulled Apple Cider

ingredients.name: Cups of unfiltered apple juice (freshly juiced)
Apple slices and star anise to garnish

instructions: 1. Add all the spices and citrus peels to a saucepan
2. Add the maple syrup, pour in the apple juice, and bring to a slow boil
3. Reduce the heat and gently simmer for 30–40 minutes
4. Remove from the heat, ladle into mugs and garnish with apple slices and star anise
5. Enjoy!

name: Mock Champagne Punch
instructions: 1. Pour the white grape juice into a large punch bowl
2. Top with ginger ale just before serving
3. Add ice
4. Garnish with fresh fruit

name: Apple Cider Float

ingredients.name: Scoop good quality vanilla ice cream
Whipped cream, apple slices and cinnamon stick to garnish

instructions: 1. Warm the apple cider in a small saucepan over a medium heat
2. Spoon some cinnamon sugar into a shallow plate
3. Pour some caramel sauce into another shallow plate
4. Dip the rim of heat-proof clear glass mug into the caramel sauce
5. Ladle the warmed cider into the mugs
6. Top with a scoop or two of vanilla ice cream
7. Dollop whipped cream over the top
8. Garnish with a drizzle of caramel sauce, sliced apples and a cinnamon stick

name: Pumpkin Smoothie
instructions: 1. Add the purée, frozen banana, ground flaxseed, pumpkin spice, vanilla extract and milk to a blender
2. Blitz until smooth
3. Add the honey or maple syrup and blitz again
4. Taste and adjust the sweetness if needed
5. Pour into a highball glass
6. Spoon over dollops of whipped cream
7. Lightly sprinkle pumpkin spice over the top
8. Serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Holiday Punch

ingredients.name: Orange slices, cranberries and cherries to garnish

instructions: 1. Combine all the fruit juices in a punch bowl or large jug
2. Top with sparkling apple juice and ginger ale just before serving
3. Mix gently to combine
4. Add ice and garnish with fresh fruit

name: Southern Sweet Tea Recipe

ingredients.name: Lemon slices and fresh mint sprigs to garnish

instructions: 1. Bring 4 cups of the water to a boil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat
2. Remove from heat, add the tea bags and steep for 5 minutes
3. Remove the tea bags and add 1 cup of granulated sugar to the tea, stirring until completely dissolved
4. Pour the tea base into a gallon pitcher. If using multiple pitchers, divide the tea evenly between them and top with water
5. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or overnight
6. Serve over ice, with sliced lemon or fresh mint

name: Non-Alcoholic Pumpkin Spice Latte

ingredients.name: Tablespoon good-quality maple syrup, or adjust to taste
Pinch pumpkin spice, or adjust to taste
Freshly brewed espresso or strong coffee
Whipped cream and pumpkin spice to garnish

instructions: 1. Combine 1 cup of milk, a tablespoon of pumpkin purée and maple syrup in a saucepan over medium heat
2. Stir often to prevent the milk from boiling
3. Once simmering, remove it from the heat
4. Whisk in the vanilla, pumpkin spice and coffee
5. Top with dollops of whipped cream
6. Garnish with a sprinkle of pumpkin spice and serve

name: Spiced Apple Cider

ingredients.name: Cinnamon sticks or star anise to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the apple cider to a large pot over medium heat
2. Add the brown sugar, allspice and a pinch of nutmeg
3. Stir until the sugar is dissolved and bring to a low boil
4. Cover the orange with whole cloves by sticking them into the peel
5. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes
6. Serve in heat-proof mugs with a cinnamon stick garnish

name: Frozen Negroni Recipe
instructions: 1. All the gin, Campari and vermouth into a blender with one scoop of ice
2. Blend until smooth then pour into a chilled rocks glass
3. Garnish with an orange slice and serve

name: Oaxacan Negroni
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and serve

name: Coffee Negroni
instructions: 1. Add the gin, Campari and vermouth to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Pour through a coffee filter with a tablespoon of freshly ground coffee beans into a rocks glass with one large ice cube
3. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and coffee beans then serve

name: White Negroni (Negroni Bianco)
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: Aperol Negroni Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: Dear Jane Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: The Cardinale
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with an orange slice and serve

name: Gloria Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with an orange twist and serve

name: Cynar Negroni
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: Spicy Negroni
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with an orange twist and serve

name: Rosita Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with lemon twist and serve

name: Kingston Negroni

ingredients.name: Appleton Estate 8 Year Old Reserve Jamaica Rum
Orange slice and pineapple frond to garnish

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled rocks glass with ice
3. Garnish with an orange slice and serve

name: Bicicletta Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a short Collins glass with ice
2. Pour in the vermouth and Campari then add the club soda
3. Stir gently to combine
4. Garnish with an orange twist and serve

name: Old Pal Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with lemon twist and serve

name: Sushi Rice Negroni
instructions: 1. Add all of the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, and stir well for at least 30 seconds
2. Double-strain the liquid into a serving glass with fresh ice
3. Add a pinch of salt, garnish with an orange twist, and serve

name: Red Dragon Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until ice cold and properly combined
3. Strain into a chilled Martini glass
4. Garnish with a lemon peel and serve

name: Purple Reign 75

ingredients.name: Dashes butterfly pea flower extract or violet liqueur

instructions: 1. Add gin, lemon juice, lavender syrup, and butterfly pea flower extract or violet liqueur to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake vigorously to chill and combine the mixture
3. Strain the cocktail into a chilled Champagne flute or coupe
4. Top with chilled Champagne and stir gently
5. Garnish with an edible flower and serve

name: Parmesan Espresso Martini

ingredients.name: Espresso, freshly brewed (or cold brew concentrate)

instructions: 1. Add all of the liquid ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake vigorously until chilled (this is crucial to give the cocktail it’s iconic foamy top)
3. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass
4. Garnish with a sprinkle of good quality grated Parmesan

name: Woo Woo Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the vodka, schnapps and cranberry juice into an ice-filled highball glass
2. Stir to combine
3. Garnish with a lime wheel and serve

name: Añejo Old Fashioned
instructions: 1. Gently muddle the orange peel, bitters and syrup in a mixing glass
2. Add the tequila, fill with ice and stir for 30 seconds
3. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass with one large ice cube
4. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve

name: Bourbon Peach Schnapps

ingredients.name: Sliced peach and fresh mint to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour the bourbon, peach schnapps and orange juice into a glass filled with ice
2. Stir to combine
3. Garnish with a slice of peach and sprig of mint and serve

name: Old Cuban
instructions: 1. Add the mint leaves, lime juice and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker
2. Gently muddle then add ice
3. Add the rum and bitters, then close the shaker
4. Shake until properly chilled
5. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass
6. Top with Champagne
7. Garnish with a sprig of mint and lime wheel
8. Serve

name: Kentucky Mule

ingredients.name: Wedge of lime and mint sprig to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass or copper mug with crushed ice
2. Add the bourbon and lime juice
3. Top with ginger beer and stir gently to combine
4. Garnish with a fresh lime wheel and a sprig of mint
5. Serve

name: Classic Whiskey Smash

ingredients.name: Lemon wedge, cut into smaller wedges
Mint sprig and lemon for garnish

instructions: 1. Add the mint and lemon wedges to a cocktail shaker
2. Gently muddle to release juices and oils
3. Add the bourbon, simple syrup and ice
4. Shake for at least 30 seconds
5. Strain into a tumbler filled with crushed ice
6. Garnish with a sprig of mint and lemon wedge, and serve

name: Pickle Juice Whiskey Sour

ingredients.name: Old Bay seasoning to rim the glass

instructions: 1. Rub a lemon wedge along the rim of a chilled coupe glass
2. Dip the glass into a plate of Old Bay seasoning to rim the edges with spice
3. Add the bourbon, pickle juice and lemon juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
4. Shake vigorously for at least 15 seconds
5. Strain into the prepared glass and serve

name: Fuzzy Navel Recipe

ingredients.name: Peach slice or orange twist for garnish

instructions: 1. Add peach schnapps and orange juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake well for at least 15 seconds
3. Strain into a chilled glass filled with ice
4. Garnish with a slice of peach or a twist of orange peel

name: Navy Grog Recipe

ingredients.name: Sprig of mint and lime wheel to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the rum, fresh juices and honey syrup to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until well-combined and frosty
3. Strain into a highball or tumbler over crushed ice
4. Top with soda
5. Garnish with a fresh sprig of mint and lime wheel

name: Rum Punch Recipe

ingredients.name: Wray and Nephew White Overproof Rum
Cherry or pineapple wedge to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the rum, juices and grenadine into an ice-filled shaker, and shake until frosty
2. Strain into a glass over fresh ice
3. Garnish with a pineapple wedge or cherry

name: Southside Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the fresh mint and lemon juice to a cocktail shaker and muddle to release the minty flavor
2. Add gin, simple syrup and ice then shake until frosty
3. Strain into a chilled coupe
4. Garnish with a sprig of mint

name: Campari Spritz
instructions: 1. Fill a wine glass with ice
2. Gently pour in the Prosecco and Campari
3. Top with soda
4. Stir gently and garnish with a slice of fresh orange

name: Gin Sour Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the gin, simple syrup, egg white and lemon juice to a cocktail shaker
2. Dry shake for 15 seconds, then add ice
3. Shake the cocktail for another 30 seconds until frosty
4. Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a lemon wheel

name: New York Sour Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the whiskey, lemon juice and simple syrup to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake vigorously for about 20 seconds
3. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice
4. Slow pour the red wine over the back of a bar spoon on top of the cocktail to create a layered effect
5. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve

name: Tequila Sour

ingredients.name: Lemon or lime wheel to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white to an ice-filled shaker
2. Shake vigorously for 15-30 seconds, until the egg white is frothy and the ingredients are well combined
3. Strain into an ice filled rocks glass
4. Garnish the rim with a lemon or lime wheel and serve

name: Painkiller Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add the dark rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and cream of coconut to the shaker and shake well
3. Fill a tall glass with crushed ice
4. Strain the cocktail over the ice
5. Top with a sprinkle of freshly grated nutmeg
6. Garnish with a pineapple wedge or orange slice (optional)

name: Cynar Spritz

ingredients.name: Sliced citrus, cucumber or rosemary to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a wine glass with plenty of ice
2. Add the Cynar, Prosecco, and soda
3. Stir gently to combine
4. Garnish and serve

name: Dirty Shirley Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the SKYY Vodka and grenadine to a serving glass filled with ice
2. Top with the lemon-lime soda and stir gently and briefly to combine
3. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve

name: Vodka Iced Tea
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in the vodka, iced tea, lemon juice and simple syrup
3. Stir to combine
4. Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve

name: Vodka and Coke
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in vodka and top with coke
3. Add a squeeze of fresh lime
4. Garnish with a lime wedge, stir and enjoy

name: Palmetto Cocktail

ingredients.name: Orange or lemon peel to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the rum, sweet vermouth and orange bitters to an ice-filled mixing glass
2. Stir until icy cold – about 30 seconds
3. Strain into a frosted coupe and garnish with a lemon twist

name: Cuba Libre Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice
2. Add the rum and top with coke
3. Add the fresh lime juice and garnish with the lime wheel
4. Stir gently and serve

name: Vodka Tonic
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in the vodka and add a squeeze of fresh lime
3. Drop the wedge into the drink and top with tonic water
4. Stir and serve

name: Vodka and Pineapple Juice
instructions: 1. Add ice cubes to a highball glass
2. Add the vodka and top with pineapple juice
3. Add a squeeze of fresh lime juice for some extra zest
4. Stir and serve

name: Shirley Temple Drink Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a Collins glass with cubed ice
2. Add the grenadine and lime juice
3. Top with the ginger ale and gently stir to combine
4. Garnish with maraschino cherries, and serve

name: Vodka Soda
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Add the vodka
3. Top it up with club soda
4. Express the oils of the grapefruit peel over the glass to release its oils, then drop it into the drink
5. Stir and serve

name: Pegu Club Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the gin, orange liqueur, lime juice, and bitters to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Give it a good shake
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
4. Garnish with a lime peel twist and serve

name: Vodka Sidecar

ingredients.name: Castor sugar to rim the glass (optional)

instructions: 1. Add the vodka, orange liqueur, and lemon juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until icy cold and set aside
3. Strain the cocktail into a chilled glass, garnish with a lemon wheel, and serve

name: The Clicker Cocktail

ingredients.name: A dehydrated mushroom slice, sprig of thyme, and orange peel to garnish

instructions: 1. Add all the liquid ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled
2. Strain into a serving glass, and garnish with an optional slice of dehydrated mushroom, a sprig of thyme, and orange peel

name: Green Hornet Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in the whiskey, vodka, gin, creme de menthe, and sour mix
3. Give it a good stir, then top with equal parts cola and lemonade
4. Stir again and garnish with a slice of lemon, if preferred

name: Revolver Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine the bourbon, coffee liqueur and orange bitters in a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir until well-chilled
2. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
3. Flame an orange peel over the top of the drink to express the oil, and garnish the drink with the peel

name: Squashed Frog
instructions: 1. Fill half the shot glass with melon liqueur
2. Add the Advocaat and watch it sink to the bottom of the glass
3. Add a splash of grenadine

name: Golden Cadillac Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the créme de cacao and anise liqueur to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until frosty (about 30 seconds should do the trick)
3. Strain into chilled glasses
4. Sprinkle nutmeg over the top, and serve

name: Alabama Slammer

ingredients.name: Orange wheel and maraschino cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the bourbon, sloe gin, amaretto, and orange juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until frosty (about 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a highball glass over fresh ice
4. Garnish and serve

name: Baby Guinness Shot
instructions: 1. Pour the coffee liqueur into a shot glass
2. Place a teaspoon upside down at an angle inside the shot glass, with the tip of the spoon touching the side of the glass, resting on the coffee liqueur
3. Slowly pour the Irish cream liqueur over the back of the spoon, to create a distinct layering effect

name: Grand Mimosa
instructions: 1. Pour the Grand Marnier into a chilled flute or coupe glass
2. Add the Champagne, then top with orange juice
3. Garnish with a fresh strawberry on the rim, and serve

name: Tiramisu White Russian
instructions: 1. Add the cold cream and sugar to a mixing bowl then whisk until soft peaks form
2. Pour the coffee liqueur and rum into a rocks glass with ice
3. Stir well to chill then top with whipped cream
4. Garnish with cocoa powder and a biscuit then serve

name: Champagne Margarita
instructions: 1. Combine the orange liqueur, tequila, and lime juice in a mixing glass with ice and stir well to chill
2. Strain into a serving glass, top it off with your choice of Champagne or Prosecco, and garnish with a lime wedge

name: Grand Margarita Cocktail

ingredients.name: Coarse salt to rim the glass

instructions: 1. Rim glasses with salt and set aside
2. Add the tequila, Grand Marnier, and lime juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
3. Shake for about 30 seconds, then strain into your prepared glasses
4. Serve

name: Strawberry Mimosa
instructions: 1. Add the strawberries and orange juice to a blender, and blend until smooth
2. Pour the Champagne into a flute by holding the glass at a 45-degree angle
3. Top off with the orange-strawberry juice
4. Add strawberry slices as a garnish if preferred

name: Love Potion Number 9 Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine the bourbon, Grand Marnier, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until frosty, and strain into a chilled serving glass
3. Charge with Prosecco, and top off with a bit of crushed ice

name: Between the Sheets Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the rum, Cognac, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake for 20 seconds to chill then strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: Pink Lady Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker without ice, and shake for 30 seconds
2. Add ice, then shake for 30 seconds more
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with Maraschino or Luxardo cherries

name: Mad Hatter Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the whiskey, simple syrup, lime, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker
2. Add 1 scoop of ice and stir for 30 seconds to chill
3. Rinse the chilled glass with absinthe and then discard
4. Strain the cocktail into the chilled coupe glass
5. Garnish with grated nutmeg and serve

name: Azalea Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the gin, pineapple juice, lemon juice, and grenadine into a cocktail shaker
2. Add a scoop of ice then close the shaker and shake for 20 seconds to chill
3. Strain into a highball glass with ice
4. Garnish with a lemon slice and serve

name: Raspberry Martini Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the raspberries to a cocktail shaker and muddle well to crush
2. Pour the vodka, simple syrup, and lemon juice into the shaker
3. Add 1 scoop of ice, then close the shaker and shake for 20 seconds
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass

name: Blue Hawaiian Long Island Iced Tea

ingredients.name: To garnish, a pineapple wedge or cherry

instructions: 1. Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake well, strain into a serving glass with fresh ice, garnish and serve

name: Vieux Carré Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a cherry or lemon twist

instructions: 1. Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice
2. Stir well, strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice
3. Garnish with a cherry or lemon twist, and serve

name: Ramos Gin Fizz Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients, apart from the club soda, to a cocktail shaker and dry shake for a full minute without ice
2. Then add ice and shake until well-chilled
3. Strain into a serving glass (we like a Collins), and top with soda

name: Black Manhattan Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the whiskey, Averna, and bitters into a cocktail shaker
2. Add a scoop of ice and stir for 30 seconds to chill
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
4. Garnish and serve immediately

name: Ranch Water Recipe with Tequila

ingredients.name: Topo Chico (or other sparkling mineral water)
To garnish, a lime wedge and a sprig of mint (optional)

instructions: 1. Combine the tequila and lime juice in a highball glass and give it a good stir.
2. Fill with ice and charge with sparkling mineral water.
3. Garnish with a lime wedge and optional sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Banana Daiquiri Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the rum, banana liqueur, lime juice and demerara simple syrup into an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake vigorously until icy cold
3. Strain into a chilled glass
4. Garnish with a banana slice, and serve

name: Green Tea Shot Recipe
instructions: 1. Combine the whisky, peach schnapps, and sour mix in a cocktail shaker with some ice, and shake until frosty
2. Strain into four shot glasses
3. Top off each shot with the lemon-lime soda

name: Brown Sugar Syrup Recipe
instructions: 1. Heat the water in a small pan over low heat
2. Add the brown sugar and heat slowly, while stirring to dissolve the sugar completely
3. Cool the syrup to room temperature before transferring it to a glass jar or bottle with a lid
4. Store in the fridge for up to a month

name: Cranberry Orange Whiskey Sour
instructions: 1. For the rim: place a good amount of sugar on a small plate, wet the rim of a lowball glass with lemon juice, then dip the rim into the sugar to coat
2. Fill the lowball glass with crushed ice, and set aside to cool
3. Add the whiskey, cranberry juice, orange juice, lemon juice and simple syrup into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds until chilled
4. Pour the mixture into the prepared glass, and garnish with fresh cranberries and thyme before serving

name: Cranberry Mimosa Recipe

ingredients.name: Rosemary and fresh cranberries or pomegranate seeds to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour the chilled orange and cranberry juice into a champagne flute
2. Top with chilled Champagne
3. Garnish with cranberry or pomegranate and a sprig of rosemary

name: Mistletoe Martini
instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake vigorously for around 30 seconds
3. Strain into chilled glasses
4. Garnish with cranberries and mint or rosemary

name: Naked and Famous Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake for 30 seconds to chill then strain into a chilled coupé glass and serve

name: Mezcal Margarita Recipe

ingredients.name: Lime wheel and salt to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the mezcal, orange liqueur, lime juice, and agave syrup to a cocktail shaker filled with ice, and shake until well chilled
2. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice
3. Place the salt in a saucer, wet the rim of the glass, and dip it to salt the rim
4. Garnish with a lime wheel, and serve

name: Honey Syrup Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the honey into a measuring cup
2. Add the warm water and stir well until combined
3. Pour into a sterilized bottle
4. Seal and store in the fridge for up to 1 month

name: Saturn Cocktail

ingredients.name: Lime twist wrapped around a cherry and skewered

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a blender with 1 scoop of crushed ice and blend until smooth
2. Pour into a rocks glass then garnish and serve

name: Jello Shot Recipe

ingredients.name: 10 X 2 oz plastic containers with lids

instructions: 1. Pour the jello into a large mixing bowl
2. Add the boiling water and whisk well to dissolve the gelatine
3. Add the cold water and vodka and whisk well to combine
4. Pour the mixture into the plastic containers but leave a gap
5. Pop the lids on and place them in the fridge for 3-4 hours or until set
6. Serve cold and enjoy

name: Eggnog Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, grated nutmeg or cinnamon

instructions: 1. Mix the eggs using a whisk, electric mixer, or blender for 1 minute
2. Add the sugar, nutmeg, cinnamon, allspice, and cloves, and blend for another 30 seconds
3. Slowly pour in Wild Turkey and Grand Marnier, and blend for another 30 seconds
4. Add the milk and cream and blend for 1 minute more
5. Cover and leave in the fridge to chill, preferably overnight
6. Garnish with nutmeg or cinnamon just before serving

name: Boulevardier Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice
2. Add the bourbon, Campari, and vermouth
3. Stir for about 30 seconds, until chilled
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
5. Twist the orange peel over the drink to express its oils, then use the peel as garnish
6. Serve

name: Peppermint Eggnog
instructions: 1. Add the vodka and the schnapps to the eggnog and stir well
2. Chill in the fridge for one hour
3. Pour into your desired serving glasses or cups, garnish with a candy cane if desired, and serve

name: Apple Cider Vinegar Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a double rocks glass with ice
2. Add the bourbon, vinegar, maple syrup, and ginger beer and stir until chilled
3. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve

name: Christmas Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Tsp of simple syrup per drink
Cinnamon-fine sugar mix for the rim
Fresh cranberries and a sprig of rosemary to garnish

instructions: 1. Prepare the rim: set up two plates—one with cinnamon sugar and the other with water. Turn the glass upside down and dip the rim into the water. Let the excess drip off then dip the rim into the cinnamon sugar to coat
2. Add the gin, cranberry juice, orange liqueur, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 30 seconds until cold
3. Strain into the sugar-rimmed glass
4. Garnish with fresh cranberries and rosemary then serve

name: Vine Street Cocktail

ingredients.name: 2 Grapes with a mint leaf between them on a cocktail skewer to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the grapes, mint, simple syrup and lime juice to a cocktail shaker
2. Muddle the ingredients to infuse the flavors
3. Fill the shaker with ice then add the vodka and rosé and shake for 30 seconds to chill
4. Strain into a double rocks glass and top with Prosecco
5. Garnish and serve

name: Easy Singapore Sling Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, an orange slice and cherry (optional)

instructions: 1. Combine the gin, liqueurs, pineapple juice, lime juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until well-chilled and strain into a highball or Hurricane glass with fresh ice
3. Charge with club soda, garnish (if preferred), and serve

name: Vegan Eggnog
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients except for the bourbon to a blender and blitz until smooth
2. Place the mixture into a saucepan and bring to a gentle heat, keep whisking until it simmers. You’ll notice it thicken throughout this process
3. Remove from the heat and stir through the bourbon
4. Strain the vegan eggnog through a sieve into a pitcher to remove any lumps, and place it in the fridge until thoroughly chilled
5. When you’re ready to serve, give the eggnog a good stir and then pour into glasses
6. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg or cinnamon

name: Tepache Recipe

ingredients.name: Small knob of ginger, sliced into 3 pieces
Small jalapeño chili, sliced in half (optional)

instructions: 1. Give the pineapple a quick rinse in cold water to remove any dust
2. Cut the head off the pineapple and discard
3. Cut the skin off the pineapple, then cut the flesh off the core
4. Save the flesh for a snack or use it to make a pineapple daiquiri
5. Place the core and skin into the fermentation bottle
6. Add the rest of the ingredients and the water but leave a 2-inch gap
7. Use a wooden spoon to stir until the sugar has dissolved
8. Cover with cheesecloth and secure with an elastic band
9. Let it sit at room temperature for 2-3 days to ferment. After 3 days it should be bubbly
10. Strain through a sieve into 11 oz bottles then seal and let sit for another 2 days at room temperature to carbonate
11. After 2 days, move the bottles to the fridge to chill then pour and enjoy

name: Dairy-Free Eggnog

ingredients.name: Agave syrup, maple syrup, or honey
Tsp freshly grated nutmeg, plus more for serving

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a food processor or blender and blend on high speed for around 1 minute until frothy
2. Pour into a pitcher
3. Refrigerate for 4 hours until the eggnog is completely chilled before serving
4. Blend again before serving and garnish with freshly grated nutmeg

name: Limoncello Spritz Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, lemon rounds, mint or rosemary

instructions: 1. Pour the limoncello into your serving glass with ice, and stir until cool
2. Top off with the Prosecco and club soda
3. Garnish as preferred, and serve

name: Hot Buttered Rum Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the sugar, butter, vanilla extract, and spices to an Irish coffee glass or mug, and mix well
2. Pour in the rum
3. Top off with hot water and give it a good stir
4. Garnish with an optional cinnamon stick, and serve

name: Mudslide Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Pour in the vodka, coffee liqueur, Irish cream and heavy cream
3. Shake for 30 seconds to chill then strain into a chilled coupe glass and serve

name: S’mores Martini
instructions: 1. Dip martini glasses into a shallow plate of chocolate syrup and then into crushed crackers
2. Pop them into the freezer to chill for about 20 minutes before serving
3. Add chocolate liqueur, marshmallow-vodka, bourbon and cream to an ice-filled cocktail
4. Shake vigorously until chilled (about 30 seconds)
5. Strain into your prepared martini glasses
6. Garnish with a toasted marshmallow skewer and serve immediately

name: Apple Pie Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, apple slices, cinnamon stick and star anise

instructions: 1. Combine the cinnamon and sugar in a shallow plate, rim the serving glass with honey, and dip into the mixture
2. Combine the vodka, bourbon, and apple cider in a cocktail shaker with ice, and mix well
3. Add fresh ice to the glass, and decant the mixture
4. Garnish with apple slices, cinnamon and star anise according to your preference

name: Americano Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: Orange slice and lemon twist to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a double rocks glass with ice
2. Pour in the Campari and vermouth then top it up with club soda
3. Stir gently to combine
4. Garnish with orange slice and lemon twist, then serve

name: Orange Creamsicle Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, orange slices, whipped cream or ice cream (optional)

instructions: 1. Add the vodka, Grand Marnier, half-and-half and orange juice to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake well, and strain into a glass filled with fresh ice
3. Garnish with a simple orange slice, or add whipped cream or ice cream of top for an extra lavish serve

name: Sea Breeze Cocktail

ingredients.name: Lime wedge or orange slice to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice
2. Pour in the vodka, cranberry, and grapefruit juice
3. Stir until chilled then garnish with lime or orange and serve

name: Greyhound Recipe

ingredients.name: 1 teaspoon maple syrup or simple syrup per drink (optional)

instructions: 1. Fill a Collins Glass with ice
2. Add the gin, grapefruit juice and syrup (optional) in a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake until cold
3. Strain into the glass, and garnish with grapefruit slices and fresh rosemary

name: Pineapple Martini
instructions: 1. Put all the ingredients into a shaker with a handful of ice
2. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds until icy cold
3. Strain into a chilled glass and serve

name: Best Tom Collins Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a maraschino cherry and a lemon wheel

instructions: 1. Shake the gin, syrup and lemon juice to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes until well chilled
2. Strain into a Collins glass filled glass with ice, and charge the glass with soda water
3. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cocktail cherry, and serve

name: Orange Crush Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a pint glass with ice
2. Add the vodka, orange liqueur, fresh orange juice, and bitters
3. Top up with lemon-lime soda and stir gently with a bar spoon
4. Garnish with orange and serve

name: How to Make a Dry Martini

ingredients.name: Olive or lemon twist, to garnish

instructions: 1. Put your martini glasses into the freezer about 30 minutes before serving
2. Pour the gin, dry vermouth, and bitters into an ice-filled mixing glass and stir until ice cold
3. Strain into a pre-chilled martini glass
4. Twist a lemon peel over the Dry Martini, and drop it into the drink
5. Serve

name: Matador Cocktail
instructions: 1. Half–fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add the tequila, orange liqueur and vermouth
3. Shake for 30 seconds then strain into a chilled coupe glass, garnish and serve immediately

name: Grinch Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice, add the melon liqueur and rum, top with the lemon-lime soda, and stir gently to combine
2. Top with a cherry (if you like) and serve

name: Watermelon Martini

ingredients.name: cups watermelon chunks, for the juice

instructions: 1. Prepare the rim for the glasses: mix sugar and salt together, then wet your glasses with a piece of watermelon and dip them in the salt and sugar mixture
2. Make the watermelon juice: put the watermelon chunks in a blender and blend till liquified
3. Add the watermelon juice, vodka, lime juice and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well
4. Strain content into the chilled martini glasses
5. Garnish with watermelon wedges and serve

name: Pumpkin Martini

ingredients.name: Irish cream liqueur, plus more for rimming
tablespoons finely crushed graham crackers, for rimming

instructions: 1. Combine graham crackers, sugar and half of the pumpkin spice into an even consistency. Pour a little Irish Cream liqueur in a side dish. Wet the rim of your glass into the liqueur and gently roll it into the graham cracker mixture, removing any excess. Place the glass in the freezer for a quick chill while you’re making the cocktail.
2. Add the vanilla-flavored vodka, Irish cream, pumpkin purée and half of the pumpkin spice into a cocktail shaker with ice.
3. Shake vigorously for at least 30 seconds.
4. Strain cocktail into the chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with the cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Irish Coffee Cocktail

ingredients.name: Teaspoons soft brown sugar to taste

instructions: 1. Pour the coffee into a heatproof mug or glass with the sugar.
2. Add the whiskey and stir to dissolve the sugar.
3. Pour the lightly whipped cream slowly over the back of a spoon to allow it to float on top of the coffee.
4. Sip the coffee through the cream for the full effect.

name: Peppermint Martini

ingredients.name: Peppermint Schnapps or Crème de Menthe
Peppermint candies and grenadine, for the rim

instructions: 1. Prepare the rim: crush the peppermint candies on a plate and put them on an even layer. Lay grenadine on another plate, then roll the rim of your martini glass over the grenadine to wet it (you can also wet it with water using your finger). Roll wet rim over the crushed candies until evenly coated.
2. Add peppermint schnapps, vodka, crème de cacao and heavy cream to a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice. Shake vigorously until cold.
3. Strain drink into the prepared martini glass and serve.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice, add the vermouth and Campari and stir
2. Top with Prosecco
3. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve

name: Kimchi Bloody Mary

ingredients.name: Kimchi, pickled onions and jalapeños to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour all the ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Give it a good shake until chilled (30 seconds should do the trick)
3. Rim the edge of a highball glass with salt
4. Add ice
5. Strain the Kimchi Bloody Mary into the salt-rimmed glass
6. Garnish with whatever your heart desires, and serve!

name: Simple Mulled Wine Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the red wine into a large saucepan with all the spices and maple syrup
2. Heat very gently until simmering and remove from the heat
3. Use a slotted spoon to remove the spices
4. Stir in the brandy and pour into a heatproof glass or mug
5. Garnish with a piece of clementine peel

name: Recipe for Pisco Sour Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white to a cocktail shaker without ice, and shake for 15 seconds
2. Now add ice to the cocktail shaker, and shake again for another 30 seconds
3. Strain the drink into a cocktail glass
4. Garnish with a few dots of bitters on the foam

name: Pear Martini
instructions: 1. Add all ingredients into a Boston shaker with ice.
2. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds.
3. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
4. Garnish with pear and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Fizz Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a wedge of lemon and maraschino cherry

instructions: 1. Add the sloe gin, lemon juice and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker.
2. Add a handful of ice and shake until icy-cold.
3. Strain into a highball or Collins glass filled with ice.
4. Top up with club soda and garnish with lemon and cherry.

name: Blue Hawaiian Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry

instructions: 1. Pour the rum into a cocktail shaker with a good handful of ice.
2. Add the blue curaçao, cream of coconut and pineapple and lemon juices.
3. Shake until icy cold and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.
4. Garnish with the pineapple wedge, cherry and the brightest cocktail umbrella.

name: Christmas Negroni

ingredients.name: Cinnamon sticks, star anise and fresh bay leaves to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour the Campari, infused gin and vermouth into an ice filled mixing glass
2. Stir until ice cold (about 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over a large ice cube or sphere
4. Twist an orange peel over the Negroni to release its oil and add it to the drink
5. Garnish with cinnamon stick, star anise and a fresh bay leaf

name: Blue Lagoon Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a slice of lemon and maraschino cherry

instructions: 1. Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker with a good handful of ice.
2. Add the blue curacao and top up with lemonade.
3. Shake until icy cold and strain into a hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry

name: Dark ‘n Stormy Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a glass with ice, and add the ginger beer and optional lime juice
2. Float the rum on top and add a dash or two of bitters
3. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve

name: Cranberry Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: 1 teaspoon of simple syrup per drink
To garnish, fresh cranberries and a lemon wedge

instructions: 1. Rim the serving glass with sugar
2. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake until cold
3. Strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, garnish with cranberries and a lemon wedge, and serve

name: Snowball Cocktail

ingredients.name: Sparkling lemonade to top off each drink
To garnish, a cinnamon stick for stirring

instructions: 1. Add the advocaat and lime juice to a glass, and mix to combine
2. Top off the glass with cold, sparkling lemonade
3. Serve with a cinnamon stick to stir, if preferred

name: Rum Runner Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake until cold and strain into a serving glass
3. Garnish with fresh fruit and serve

name: Gimlet Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the gin, lime juice, syrup and ice to a cocktail shaker and shake until cold
2. Strain into a coupe glass and top with a splash of club soda, if preferred
3. Garnish with a lime wheel, serve and enjoy!

name: Vodka Cranberry Recipe
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in the vodka, top with cranberry juice and stir
3. Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Amaretto Sour Recipe

ingredients.name: Lemon peel and Luxardo cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the amaretto, bourbon, lemon juice, syrup, egg white, and bitters to a cocktail shaker without ice and shake for 15 seconds
2. Now add the ice to the cocktail shaker and shake it for another 30 seconds
3. Strain the drink into a glass – the foam will gather at the top
4. Garnish with a lemon peel and Luxardo cherry

name: Whiskey Sour with Egg White

ingredients.name: To garnish, orange peel and a cocktail cherry per drink

instructions: 1. Combine the whiskey, lemon juice, syrup, and egg white in a cocktail shaker (without ice) and shake for 15 seconds
2. Add ice to the cocktail shaker and shake for another 30 seconds
3. Strain the drink into a glass on fresh ice (optional); the foam will collect at the top
4. Garnish with an orange peel and a cocktail cherry, and serve

name: El Presidente Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, orange peel and a cocktail cherry

instructions: 1. Add the rum, vermouth, Grand Marnier and grenadine to a mixing glass filled with ice and stir until cold
2. Strain into a cocktail glass
3. Squeeze the orange peel over the drink, and run it along the edge of the drink before dropping it into the cocktail
4. Serve and enjoy

name: Cantarito Cocktail

ingredients.name: A pinch of salt to rim the glass (optional)

instructions: 1. Rim your Cantarito clay cup or highball glass with salt, then fill it with ice
2. Add the tequila, orange, lime and grapefruit juice
3. Stir to combine
4. Top with grapefruit soda and garnish with a wedge of lime

name: Clarified Milk Punch Recipe
instructions: 1. Combine the lemon zest, cloves, coriander, and cinnamon with the cognac, rum, and Arrack in a large container, and let it sit overnight to infuse
2. The next day, strain and discard the solids
3. Add the sugar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, green tea, and boiling water to the spirits mixture, and stir until the sugar has fully dissolved
4. Bring the milk to a slow simmer in a large saucepan over medium heat
5. As soon as the milk starts to simmer, remove it from the heat and pour it into a large container
6. Pour the spirits mixture into the container with the heated milk (NOT the other way around) – it should begin to curdle almost immediately
7. Allow the mixture to cool and leave in the fridge (ideally overnight)
8. Strain the mixture through a jelly strainer bag or white cotton T-shirt (cheesecloth absorbs too much) – add it all at once and let it drain at its own pace
9. Repeat the process slowly and carefully (it will be worth it!) until the clarity is where you want it – the more you strain it, the clearer the liquid will become
10. Once strained, the liquid is stable and can be kept in the fridge until your guests arrive
11. To serve, pour over ice and serve, garnished with a grating of nutmeg if desired

name: Key Lime Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka, coconut, pineapple juice, key lime juice and cream to a cocktail shaker
2. Give it a dry shake for around 30-60 seconds
3. Add ice, close it up and shake again until icy cold
4. Strain into a chilled Graham–cracker–rimmed martini glass

name: Cucumber Martini

ingredients.name: Inch piece of cucumber, cut into chunks
To garnish, a few thin cucumber slices

instructions: 1. Add the cucumber chunks to a cocktail shake
2. Crush the cucumber gently with a muddler (or the end of a rolling pin if that’s what you have handy)
3. Add the rest of your ingredients along with a handful of ice
4. Cover and shake until icy-cold
5. Strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish and sip away

name: Bourbon Watermelon Cocktail
instructions: 1. In a Collins glass, muddle the mint and sugar until fragrant
2. Add the bourbon, and stir gently
3. Add the watermelon juice, and stir to combine
4. Add ice, and top off with club soda
5. Serve and enjoy immediately

name: Classic Gibson Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour all the ingredients to an ice-filled mixing glass
2. Stir for around 30 seconds until chilled
3. Strain into a chilled coupe
4. Garnish with cocktail onions and serve

name: Bourbon Rickey
instructions: 1. Add ice to a Highball glass
2. Add the rest of the ingredients
3. Give it a gentle stir, and serve

name: Mexican Mule Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the tequila, ginger beer, lime juice and simple syrup into a copper mug or highball glass
2. Stir gently then top with ice
3. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve

name: Gin and Juice Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake vigorously
2. Strain into a Collins glass with fresh ice, and serve

name: Pornstar Martini with Gin

ingredients.name: To garnish, a passionfruit slice per drink

instructions: 1. Add all ingredients except the Prosecco into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously
2. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with a passion fruit slice
4. Serve with Prosecco (or any dry sparkling wine) on the side

name: Penicillin Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Muddle the fresh ginger in the bottom of a cocktail shaker until well mashed
2. Add the Wild Turkey Bourbon 101, lemon juice, and honey syrup, along with ice and shake until well chilled
3. Double-strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice
4. Pour the Glen Grant Arboralis whiskey over the back of a spoon so it floats on top of the drink

name: Rob Roy Cocktail

ingredients.name: Glen Grant Single Malt Scotch Whisky

instructions: 1. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice
2. Stir until chilled
3. Strain into a coupe
4. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry

name: Derby Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker
2. Add ice and shake until cold (about 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
4. Garnish with grapefruit twist

name: Vodka Collins Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry

instructions: 1. Add a handful of ice to a Collins or highball glass
2. Pour in the vodka, lemon syrup and simple syrup over the ice
3. Stir thoroughly and top up with club soda
4. Garnish with a slice of orange and cherry

name: Harvey Wallbanger Ingredients
instructions: 1. Add vodka and orange juice to a tall ice-filled glass
2. Pour Galliano over a spoon to float it on top of the drink
3. Garnish with fresh orange slices and a cherry

name: White Lady Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish a twist of lemon

instructions: 1. Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker or mason jar and shake for 10 seconds until it’s frothy
2. Add a handful of ice and shake for 10 seconds until icy-cold
3. Strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist

name: Sparkling Apple Cider Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish a slice of apple and a sprig of thyme

instructions: 1. Add the vodka, lemon and bitters to a cocktail shaker or mason jar with a handful of ice
2. Shake for 10-20 seconds until it’s icy cold
3. Strain into a tumbler, add an apple slice and top with cider
4. Garnish with thyme

name: Gold Rush Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the bourbon, honey syrup and lemon juice to an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake for 30 seconds, or until icy cold
3. Strain into a rocks glass over one large ice cube
4. Garnish with a lemon peel twist.

name: How to Make a Screwdriver Drink
instructions: 1. Add ice to a chilled highball glass
2. Add the vodka
3. Add the orange juice
4. Stir, garnish and serve

name: Strawberry Banana Daiquiri

ingredients.name: large strawberries, hulled and cut in halved
To garnish a strawberry and a slice of banana (optional)

instructions: 1. Add all your ingredients into the blender.
2. Add a handful of ice and blitz for 10-20 seconds until icy
3. Pour it into a highball or hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a strawberry and slice of banana

name: Sex on the Beach Recipe
instructions: 1. Shake the peach schnapps, fresh orange juice and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker with ice, and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice
2. Shake the SKYY Vodka, cranberry juice and raspberry liqueur with ice and carefully pour on top of the existing drink layer in the same glass
3. Serve with a cocktail stirrer to the side so guests can mix the two layers before they enjoy the drink

name: Aperol Spritz Recipe
instructions: 1. Fill a white wine glass with ice
2. Pour in the prosecco
3. Followed by the Aperol
4. Top with a splash of soda
5. Garnish with a slice of orange

name: Bushwacker Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, shaved chocolate or grated nutmeg

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth
2. Pour into a tall glass with a straw, adding your chosen garnish

name: Paper Plane Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine the Amaro Nonino, Aperol, bourbon and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker is frosty
2. Strain into a coupe glass and serve

name: Strawberry Mojito Mocktail

ingredients.name: Sliced strawberries and lime wheels to garnish

instructions: 1. Crush the strawberry and lime juice to a jug or mason jar
2. Add mint and syrup. Muddle briefly until fragrant
3. Pour into a highball glass with a handful of ice
4. Stir briefly to chill and top up with club soda
5. Garnish with a slice of lime

name: Strawberry Shrub Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add ice to a highball glass
2. Pour in the shrub syrup and vodka
3. Top with soda water
4. Garnish with fresh mint and serve with a swizzle stick for stirring

name: Sazerac Cocktail

ingredients.name: A few dashes of bitters per cocktail
To garnish, a lemon twist per cocktail

instructions: 1. Chill a rocks glass by filling it with ice and setting it aside as you prepare the rest of the cocktail
2. Soak the sugar cube with the bitters and muddle it in a mixing glass, crushing the cube
3. Add the Wild Turkey Rye Whiskey and stir
4. Take the ice out of your chilled glass and rinse it with a small amount of absinthe – swirl the liquor around and then discard
5. Pour the Wild Turkey Rye Whiskey mixture into the chilled, absinthe-rinsed glass
6. Squeeze the lemon twist gently over the drink to release its oils. Then, use it as a garnish on the rim of the glass or set it aside. Most people don’t drop it in the drink

name: Little Italy Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice
2. Stir thoroughly until well-chilled
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
4. Garnish with cherries and serve

name: Frozen Mango Margarita Cocktail

ingredients.name: to garnish, a slice of lime or mango

instructions: 1. Run a lime wedge around the rim of a cocktail or coupe glass
2. Dip the glass in salt and tap off any excess
3. Add all the cocktail ingredients to a blender and whizz until smooth
4. Pour into chilled rimmed glasses
5. Garnish with a slice of lime or mango

name: Negroni Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: Orange peel and orange slice, to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour the Campari, gin and sweet vermouth into rocks glass filled with ice cubes
2. Stir until icy cold
3. Twist an orange peel over the drink to release its oils onto the drink
4. Garnish with fresh orange slice
5. Serve!

name: Autumn Spiced Rum Cider Cocktail

ingredients.name: to garnish, a slice of fresh apple and a cinnamon stick

instructions: 1. Pour the rum and apple cider into a small pan along with your cinnamon and ginger
2. Bring to the simmer, reduce heat to a slow simmer to 5-10 minutes
3. Remove the spices with a slotted spoon and pour into a mug
4. Garnish with a slice of apple and cinnamon stick (optional)

name: Lemon Drop Martini

ingredients.name: To garnish, a lemon twist per cocktail

instructions: 1. Rim a chilled martini or coupe glass with sugar
2. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake vigorously until cold
3. Fine strain into your prepared glass and garnish with a twist of lemon

name: Lychee Martini

ingredients.name: A dash of freshly squeezed lime juice per cocktail
To garnish, a pitted lychee or two per cocktail

instructions: 1. Add the vodka, lychee liqueur (or syrup), and lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well
2. Strain into a chilled Martini or coupe glass
3. Garnish with a pitted lychee fruit or two on a cocktail garnish pin

name: Mexican Manhattan Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish a twist of lime

instructions: 1. Add the tequila, sweet vermouth and orange bitters into large glass or jug
2. Add a handful of ice and stir until icy cold
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
4. Garnish with a lime twist

name: Miami Vice Drink Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a wedge of pineapple

instructions: 1. Add a handful of ice to the blender with all of the Daiquiri ingredients and blend until smooth
2. Pour into a hurricane glass and place in the freezer
3. Rinse and dry the blender jug
4. Add all the Piña Colada ingredients to the blender with another good handful of ice and blend until smooth
5. Take the glass from the freezer and gently top it up with the Piña Colada
6. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and enjoy

name: Jungle Bird Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, pineapple triangles and fronds, a slice of lime (optional)

instructions: 1. Add all your ingredients to a shaker or mason jar
2. Add a handful of ice and shake until ice-cold
3. Strain into a tumbler over fresh ice
4. Garnish with pineapple triangles and fronds

name: Best Piña Colada Recipe

ingredients.name: Wray and Nephew White Overproof Rum
Pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry for garnish

instructions: 1. Add ice and all Piña Colada ingredients to a blender
2. Blend until smooth
3. Pour into a chilled Hurricane glass
4. Garnish with a wedge of fresh pineapple and a Maraschino cherry

name: Apple Margarita Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, one apple slice per cocktail
To garnish, cinnamon sugar to rim each glass
A cup of ice per cocktail

instructions: 1. Wet the rim of a chilled margarita or rocks glass with a piece of apple or the apple schnapps and rim the glass with cinnamon sugar
2. In a blender, combine the tequila, apple liqueur and juice, sour mix, and ice
3. Blend until smooth
4. Pour into the prepared glass, serve and enjoy

name: How to Make a Virgin Mojito

ingredients.name: Cup club soda or ginger ale,
To garnish, a slice of lime

instructions: 1. Add mint leaves to a jug or mason jar with the sugar syrup and freshly squeezed lime juice
2. Muddle them briefly until fragrant and tip into a highball glass with a handful of ice
3. Stir briefly to chill and top up with club soda or ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of lime

name: How to Make a Mojito

ingredients.name: Handful of fresh mint, stalks removed

instructions: 1. Add the mint, sugar and lime to a shaker or mason jar
2. Muddle and crush the mint with the end of a rolling pin
3. Add the rum along with a handful of ice and shake briefly until icy cold
4. Tip into a highball glass and top up with club soda
5. Garnish with a sprig of mint, a slice of lime and enjoy

name: Bee’s Knees Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake it vigorously until ice cold
2. Strain the cocktail into a coupe or martini glass
3. Twist the lemon peel over the cocktail to release its oils and then drop it in

name: Sidecar Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a twist of orange

instructions: 1. Chill your glass in the freezer ahead of serving for best results
2. Dip the rim into a saucer with a little sugar
3. Pour the Cognac, Grand Marnier and lemon juice to a shaker
4. Add a handful of ice and shake until icy cold
5. Strain into a cocktail glass
6. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, if you like

name: Original Mai Tai Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the orange liqueur, rum, orgeat syrup and fresh lime into an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Shake until frosty (around 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a glass filled with ice
4. Top with crushed ice
5. Garnish with fresh mint
6. Serve

name: Fiery Apple Cocktail
instructions: 1. Mix the rum and sour apple liqueur in a cocktail shaker filled with ice
2. Pour it into a rocks or coupe glass
3. Add a dash of blue curacao liqueur for color
4. Charge with club soda to taste if you wish to turn it into a taller drink

name: How to Make a Non-Alcoholic Spritzer
instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add lime and grapefruit juice
3. Add agave syrup and salt
4. Cover and shake until ice cold
5. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice
6. Top with club soda and garnish with a slice of grapefruit

name: Pornstar Martini Mocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the alcohol-free vodka, passionfruit puree and juice, vanilla syrup, and lime juice into an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Firmly secure the lid and give it a good shake – around 45 seconds to a minute
3. Remove lid and strain through a fine strainer into a chilled martini glass
4. Once the drink settles, gently pop a halved passionfruit on top of the foam
5. Serve with a non-alcoholic prosecco sidecar

name: Paloma Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Rim a tall glass with lime juice and coarse salt
2. Fill the glass with ice
3. Add the tequila
4. Top with grapefruit soda
5. Garnish with a fresh wedge of lime

name: Classic Highball Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice
2. Add the whiskey
3. Top with ginger ale or club soda
4. Stir gently and serve

name: Non-Alcoholic Margarita Recipe
instructions: 1. Run a lime wedge around the rim and dip the glass in salt
2. Twist the glass until thoroughly coated and tap off any excess salt
3. Half-fill a cocktail shaker or mason jar with ice
4. Add the juices, olive brine and agave
5. Shake for 15 seconds until chilled
6. Pour into your prepared glass and top with soda
7. Garnish with lime and serve

name: Perfect Manhattan Drink
instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice
2. Add the whiskey, vermouth and bitters
3. Stir for about 30 seconds or until icy cold
4. Strain into a chilled coupe
5. Express an orange peel over the top of the glass, then drop it into the drink

name: Spicy Margarita Recipe
instructions: 1. Run the lime wedge along the rim of a rocks glass
2. Dip the rim into a plate of salt, add ice and set aside
3. Add sliced jalapeños to your cocktail shaker
4. Muddle gently using a cocktail muddler or the back of a wooden spoon
5. Add all the liquid ingredients
6. Add ice and shake until properly chilled—at least 30 seconds
7. Strain into prepared rocks glass
8. Garnish with a slice or two of jalapeño

name: Hot Apple Cider Cocktail

ingredients.name: lemon wedge or apple slice, to garnish

instructions: 1. Heat up the cider in a small saucepan and warm up an Irish Coffee glass or mug
2. Coat the bottom of the glass with honey and add the whiskey
3. Fill with hot apple cider and stir well
4. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and your choice of lemon- or apple slice

name: Virgin Martini

ingredients.name: Dash of orange or grapefruit bitters
Olive or lemon peel to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add the non-alcoholic vodka, non-alcoholic dry white wine, verjuice and bitters and stir until chilled
3. Strain into a Martini glass
4. Garnish with an olive or lemon peel and serve

name: Pornstar Martini
instructions: 1. Add all ingredients except the Prosecco into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously
2. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with a passion fruit slice
4. Serve with Prosecco (or any dry sparkling wine) on the side

name: Simple Syrup Recipe for Cocktails
instructions: 1. Heat the water in a small pan over gentle heat. (Or pour boiling water into the pan)
2. Add the sugar and heat gently to dissolve the sugar for 1 to 2 minutes
3. Cool to room temperature before using in cocktails.
4. Transfer the remaining syrup into a glass jar, using a funnel to make things easier, and store in the refrigerator for up to a month.

name: Apple Pie Moonshine Drink

ingredients.name: Apple slices, cinnamon stick, and caramel sauce for garnish (optional)

instructions: 1. Half-fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add all the ingredients (except the apple slices and caramel)
3. Shake for around 30 seconds or until ice cold
4. If you want to go the extra mile, drizzle caramel into a mason jar or highball glass
5. Strain the liquid into your ice-filled serving glass and drop in a few apple slices and a cinnamon stick

name: Recipe for French 75 Cocktail

ingredients.name: Sugar and a lemon slice (for the rim of the glass)

instructions: 1. Prepare the glass by running a slice of lemon around the rim and dipping it into a shallow bowl or saucer with sugar
2. Add the gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup to a shaker with ice – cover and shake
3. Strain the mixture into your prepared glass
4. Top off with Champagne or Prosecco
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and enjoy

name: French Blonde Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the grapefruit juice, vodka, elderflower liqueur, lemon juice and bitters, and shake well
2. Strain into a chilled serving glass
3. Garnish with a grapefruit slice, and serve

name: French Connection Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a tumbler with ice
2. Add the cognac and amaretto
3. Stir briefly to combine

name: French Martini
instructions: 1. Add the vodka, pineapple juice, and raspberry liqueur to a cocktail shaker
2. Fill it with ice and shake vigorously until cold (this creates the best foamy finish)
3. Strain into a martini glass
4. If you like, use a fresh raspberry as your French Martini garnish. C’est magnifique!

name: Strawberry Daiquiri with Vodka

ingredients.name: Mint sprig or strawberry slices to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the vodka, simple syrup, lime juice, and half a cup of ice to a blender
2. Blend until smooth and thick
3. Pour into a chilled martini or margarita glass
4. Garnish and serve

name: White Russian Cocktail
instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes
2. Add the vodka and coffee liqueur
3. Pour over a splash of heavy cream
4. Serve with a swizzle stick and pop a cherry on top

name: Bourbon Apple Cider Cocktail

ingredients.name: A sprig of thyme to garnish

instructions: 1. Add ice to a large mixing glass or cocktail shaker
2. Pour in the bourbon, cider, sweet vermouth, lemon juice and bitters
3. Stir until chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Strain into any cocktail glass of your choice
5. Garnish with a few apple slices and a sprig of thyme

name: Apple Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Simple syrup (or maple syrup if you want a quick fix)

instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes
2. Pour in the vodka, apple schnapps, orange liqueur, simple syrup, and lemon juice
3. Give it a good shake
4. Strain into chilled martini glasses
5. Garnish with apple slices

name: Vesper Martini Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the gin, vodka, vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass filled with ice
2. Stir until icy cold
3. Strain into a chilled martini glass
4. Garnish with a slice of lemon peel

name: Recipe for Hot Toddy
instructions: 1. Take a slice of lemon, press the cloves into the lemon round and set aside
2. Boil water and fill a mug to the three-quarter mark
3. Pour in the whiskey and lemon juice and stir in the sugar until dissolved
4. Add the clove-studded lemon wheel and allow to infuse
5. Serve in a warmed mug

name: Jack Frost Cocktail

ingredients.name: SKYY Vodka or Wray and Nephew Overproof White Rum
Light corn syrup and shredded coconut to rim the glass

instructions: 1. Take two plates then pour some light corn syrup onto one, and sprinkle shredded coconut flakes onto the other
2. Dip the rim of your glass into first the corn syrup and then the coconut and set aside
3. Add ice to the blender along with vodka or rum, Blue Curaçao, pineapple juice and cream of coconut
4. Blitz until smooth and frosty
5. Pour the frozen mixture into your prepared glass, pop in a straw and serve

name: Poison Apple Cocktail
instructions: 1. Combine apple cider, cranberry juice, fireball, grenadine, glitter and ice in a cocktail shaker
2. Give it a good shake, until it is icy cold (around 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a lowball glass and serve

name: Eggnog Martini

ingredients.name: Chocolate shavings, simple syrup, and cinnamon sugar to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour a dash of simple syrup onto one plate and cinnamon sugar onto another
2. Dip the rim of the martini glass into the syrup and then the cinnamon sugar and set aside
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
4. Add the vodka, amaretto liqueur and eggnog
5. Give it a good shake until chilled and creamy
6. Strain into a prepared martini glass, sprinkle over chocolate shavings and serve

name: Bloody Mary Recipe

ingredients.name: Dashes of Tabasco sauce (or your preferred hot sauce)
Dashes of Worcestershire sauce (or vegan alternative)
Pinch of salt (or celery salt if you prefer)
Celery stalk and 3 stuffed green olives to garnish
