Old Bay seasoning to rim your glass

instructions: 1. Add some Old Bay seasoning to a plate
2. Run a lemon wedge along the outer rim of your glass, then dip it into the seasoning, fill with ice, and set aside

3. Build all the ingredients in a large mixing glass and add ice, pour it into your cocktail shaker, and then back into your glass. Repeat, and then once it’s back in the cocktail shaker, strain the Bloody Mary into your prepared glass
4. Add the lemon wedge to the drink, pop in a celery stick, and balance three skewered stuffed olives on top

name: Aviation Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the gin, maraschino liqueur, crème de violette, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled
2. Strain into a cocktail glass

name: Hanky Panky Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add ice to a mixing glass, followed by the gin, sweet vermouth, and amaro
2. Stir until nicely chilled (around 30 seconds should do the trick)
3. Strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass
4. Add the orange peel as garnish and enjoy

name: Best Dirty Martini Recipe
instructions: 1. Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice
2. Strain into chilled coupe/cocktail glass
3. Garnish with three olives on a skewer

name: Old Fashioned Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the simple syrup, bitters and bourbon to a rocks glass
2. Add ice cubes
3. Stir until properly chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Express the oils from an orange peel, then drop it into the drink as garnish

name: Gin Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: A lemon peel and green olive to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes
2. Add the gin, vermouth and orange bitters
3. Stir for 30 seconds, and strain into a chilled martini glass
4. Express a lemon peel over the glass to release its oils
5. Garnish with a green olive

name: Blue Margarita Recipe

ingredients.name: Coarse salt (optional) for the rim of the glass
Lime wedge, or orange slice and cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, pour your tequila, blue curaçao, lime juice, and simple syrup
2. Shake well and pour everything through a strainer into a glass with a salted rim
3. Garnish to your taste and serve

name: Lime Margarita Recipe

ingredients.name: Lime wheel and salt to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, and agave syrup to a cocktail shaker filled with ice, and shake until well chilled
2. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice
3. Place the salt in a saucer, wet the rim of the glass, and dip it to salt the rim
4. Garnish with a lime wheel, and serve

name: Apple Butter Old Fashioned Cocktail

ingredients.name: Coarse cinnamon sugar and simple syrup, for rimming
Thinly sliced apples and a cinnamon stick, to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour some simple syrup on a plate and some coarse cinnamon sugar on another
2. Dip the rim of your cocktail glass into the syrup and then into the sugar, twisting to coat, before adding ice cubes to the glass
3. Combine the apple cider, apple butter, Wild Turkey, lemon juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker and give it a dry shake (in other words, a shake without ice)
4. Shake vigorously until properly combined then strain into your prepared cocktail glass
5. Top up with ginger beer and garnish with a cinnamon stick and apple slice on the rim to serve

name: Mango Daiquiri

ingredients.name: ½ cup fresh mango (cut into chunks, off the pip)
Strawberry, lime slices, and mint to garnish

instructions: 1. Place all the ingredients in a blender (ice last)
2. Whizz until ice is blitzed
3. Taste test, then adjust with lime juice and syrup according to preference
4. Pour into glasses
5. Garnish with strawberries, lime and mint if desired
6. Serve cold

name: Blue Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Pineapple slice, orange peel or a cherry to garnish

instructions: 1. Add ice to a cocktail shaker
2. Pour in the vodka, blue curaçao, sour mix, and pineapple juice
3. Shake until icy cold (about 30 seconds)
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass
5. Garnish with pineapple, orange peel, or a cherry

name: Easy Mint Julep Recipe
instructions: 1. In a Julep cup or rocks glass, lightly muddle the mint leaves in the simple syrup
2. Add the bourbon and pack the glass tightly with crushed ice
3. Stir until the cup is frosted on the outside
4. Top with more crushed ice to form an ice dome, and garnish with a mint sprig

name: Best Cosmopolitan Recipe
instructions: 1. Add ice to a cocktail shaker
2. Add the citrus vodka, orange liqueur, cranberry, and lime juice
3. Shake until properly chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Strain into a coupe glass
5. Garnish with a lime peel

name: Pomegranate Martini
instructions: 1. Place the vodka, pomegranate juice, triple sec, lemon juice, and syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake 15 seconds until cold
3. Strain the drink into a cocktail or martini glass
4. Use a knife to remove a 1″ wide strip of the lemon peel
5. Squeeze the lemon peel into the drink to release the oils
6. Gently run the peel around the edge of the glass, place it in the glass and serve
7. Garnish alternative: You can also add some pomegranate seeds to the bottom of your cocktail glass for an extra-special serve

name: Blood and Sand Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Add a handful of ice to a cocktail shaker
2. Add all the ingredients, close the lid and shake vigorously until extra cold
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with an orange peel twist

name: Strawberry Basil Cocktail

ingredients.name: Lime slices or wedges to garnish

instructions: 1. In a cocktail shaker, muddle the fresh strawberries and basil leaves, and fill the shaker with ice
2. Add the gin and honey, cover the shaker and shake for one minute
3. Pour into a glass filled with ice
4. Top with the club soda and garnish with a lime wedge
5. Serve and enjoy!

name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, fresh strawberry- or lime slices

instructions: 1. Blend the strawberries then push the resulting puree through a sieve to remove some of the seeds
2. Tip the sieved puree into the blender again and add the ice, rum, simple syrup, and lime juice
3. Blend again
4. Pour into a glass, and serve garnished with fresh strawberry- or lime slices

name: Gin Rickey Cocktail Ingredients

ingredients.name: Lime wheel, mint or herbs of choice to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a tall glass or rocks glass with ice
2. Pour the gin and lime juice over the ice and give it a stir
3. Top with the club soda and stir gently
4. Garnish with a lime wheel, mint or herbs of choice
5. Serve and enjoy!

name: Grasshopper Drink Ingredients
instructions: 1. Prepare a frosted martini glass by chilling it in the freezer for about an hour
2. Add a dash of either crème de cacao or crème de menthe to one plate, and chocolate shavings to another
3. Dip the rim of the martini glass into the liqueur and then into the chocolate and set aside
4. Add cracked ice to a cocktail shaker, followed by crème de menthe, crème de cacao, and cream
5. Shake it up (until you feel you might get frostbite on your hands)
6. Strain into the frosted chocolate rimmed martini glass and serve

name: Zombie Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: Wray and Nephew White Overproof Rum
Cherries, mint, and orange slices to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add the rum, then the pineapple and lime juice
3. Shake until your fingers feel at risk of frostbite, then shake a bit more
4. Fill a Collins glass with ice
5. Strain the rummy juice into the glass
6. Add a dash of Grenadine
7. Garnish with orange wedges, cherries, and mint
8. Pop in a swizzle stick and serve

name: Twinkle Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the SKYY vodka and elderflower cordial to a shaker with ice
2. Strain into a glass
3. Top with Champagne
4. Add a lemon twist and serve

name: Blushing Bride Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour the peach schnapps and grenadine into a Champagne flute
2. Top with Champagne
3. Garnish with a raspberry, and serve

name: Long Island Iced Tea Recipe
instructions: 1. Build the ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice
2. Top it off with cola and stir
3. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve with a straw

name: French Rose Cocktail
instructions: 1. Stir all ingredients with ice
2. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

name: Champagne Martini

ingredients.name: A small drizzle of simple syrup
Maraschino cherry or strawberries to garnish

instructions: 1. Slowly run a lemon slice along the rim of a chilled martini glass
2. Gently dip the rim into a plate of sweet sugar and set aside
3. Add ice to a cocktail shaker and pour in the smooth SKYY Vodka, lemon juice, and syrup
4. Cover and shake until the liquids really get to know each other (or 30 seconds)
5. Strain into your prepared martini glass
6. Add that spark(le) by topping it off with Champagne
7. To finish, drop a maraschino cherry or strawberries into the drink
8. Serve and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Champagne Cocktail
instructions: 1. Shake the premium vodka in a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Strain and pour into a martini glass or Champagne flute
3. Top up with Champagne
4. Garnish with a strawberry slice or two

name: French Pearl Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: 1 sprig fresh mint or a lime wedge to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the gin, absinthe, lime juice and rock candy syrup to a cocktail shaker with the mint and muddle it together
2. Add ice and stir well
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
4. Garnish with another sprig of mint or a lime wedge and serve

name: Witches Brew Drink
instructions: 1. Add ice to a cocktail shaker
2. Pour in all the liquid
3. Close it up and give it a good shake until icy cold
4. Strain into a lowball glass filled with ice
5. Garnish with a cherry or some gummy worms skewered onto a cocktail stick

name: Swamp Water Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add ice to a cocktail shaker
2. Pour in all your liquid ingredients
3. Give it a good shake until properly chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Add ice to a Collins glass
5. Strain the drink into the glass and garnish with a lime wedge and sprig of mint

name: Clover Club Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Add the gin, lemon juice, raspberry syrup and egg white into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously until well-chilled
2. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
3. Garnish with 3 speared raspberries

name: French Kiss Cocktail

ingredients.name: Orange slices and cinnamon stick to garnish (optional)

instructions: 1. Combine the vodka, anise liqueur, and orange juice in a shaker with ice, shake until cold, and fine strain into a chilled glass
2. Pour grenadine into the centre of the drink where it will sink
3. Garnish with orange slices and a cinnamon stick

name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri Recipe
instructions: 1. In the container of a blender, combine the strawberries, sugar, lemon juice and lemon-lime soda
2. Add the ice and blend until smooth
3. Pour into a pretty glass to serve

name: French Maid Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Muddle the cucumber and mint with the simple syrup
2. Add the rest of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into your serving glass
3. Garnish with a mint sprig through a cucumber wheel

name: Last Word Cocktail
instructions: 1. Add the gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur and lime juice to a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled
2. Strain into a chilled coupe glass
3. Garnish with a brandied cherry (optional)

name: French Manhattan
instructions: 1. Add the cognac, vermouth, orange liqueur, and bitters to a cocktail mixing glass
2. Fill the mixing glass or cocktail shaker two-thirds full with ice and stir briskly until well-chilled
3. Strain into a chilled serving glass
4. Garnish with a cherry, and serve

name: Lime Daiquiri

ingredients.name: Wray and Nephew White Overproof Rum

instructions: 1. Pour the rum, lime juice, and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice
2. Shake until properly chilled – about 30 seconds should do the trick
3. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a twist of lime

name: Black Russian Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the coffee liqueur over ice in an old fashioned glass
2. Stir until icy cold (around 30 seconds)
3. Serve

name: Rock Shandy Recipe

ingredients.name: Club soda or sparkling mineral water

instructions: 1. Fill a large highball glass with ice
2. Pour in equal parts club soda and lemonade
3. Add a few drops of bitters (¼ – ½ a teaspoon, depending on your own taste)
4. Squeeze the juice of a quartered lime into the shandy and drop it into the drink
5. Add a swizzle stick and a straw and serve!

name: Bronx Cocktail

ingredients.name: A few drops of orange bitters
An orange peel twist for garnish

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker
2. Pop on the lid and shake it up until icy cold (or around 30 seconds)
3. Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve immediately

name: Blackjack Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour all the ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned or martini glass
2. Peel the orange over the glass and twist the peel to express the citrus oils before dropping it into the drink
3. Serve and enjoy!

name: French Champagne Cocktail (Kir Royale)
instructions: 1. Pour creme de cassis in a champagne glass
2. Top with Champagne and serve!

name: Vodka Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Olive or lemon peel to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Add the vodka and vermouth and stir (or shake) until chilled
3. Strain into a martini glass
4. Garnish with an olive or lemon peel and serve

name: Classic Martini Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: Cinzano 1757 Vermouth di Torino Extra Dry
A twist of lemon and olives to garnish

instructions: 1. Add ice to a large mixing glass
2. Add the gin, vermouth and orange bitters
3. Stir until chilled (about 30 seconds)
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass
5. Express the lemon peel over the top of the drink, rub it down the stem of the glass and then drop it into the drink
6. Garnish with an olive, and serve

name: Best Espresso Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Espresso, freshly brewed (or cold brew concentrate)

instructions: 1. Add all of the liquid ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice
2. Shake vigorously until chilled (this is crucial to give the cocktail it’s iconic foamy top)
3. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass
4. Garnish with whole coffee beans, if you want, and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Daiquiri Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a sliced strawberry and lime

instructions: 1. Blend the strawberries, along with half of the syrup.
2. Push the puree through a sieve to remove the seeds.
3. Rinse the blender jug, tip in the puree along with the rum, lime juice and 3-4 ice cubes.
4. Blend and taste, adding more sugar syrup or lime juice if needed.
5. Pour into a cocktail or martini glass and garnish with a sliced strawberry and a slice of lime.

name: Italian Gentleman Cocktail

ingredients.name: To garnish, a slice of lemon

instructions: 1. Chill a coupe glass with a few ice cubes
2. Half fill a shaker with ice
3. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker( or mason jar) and shake well
4. Discard the ice from the glass and strain the cocktail into the cold coupe
5. Garnish with lemon and enjoy!

name: Brandy Alexander Recipe

ingredients.name: To garnish, a pinch of nutmeg and cinnamon (optional)

instructions: 1. Fill a shaker or mason jar with ice
2. Add the cognac and chocolate liqueur, and shake until well-chilled
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, such as a martini glass or coupe
4. Garnish with a pinch of nutmeg and cinnamon, if you like

name: Bellini Cocktail Recipe
instructions: 1. Pour the vodka and peach puree into a chilled flute
2. Top up with prosecco, splash in some bitters and gently stir and serve

name: B-52 Cocktail Ingredients
instructions: 1. Pour the coffee liqueur into a wine glass
2. With the back of a spoon lowered into your glass, gently pour the Irish cream over the spoon to float on the liqueur below
3. Repeat this method with the Grand Marnier. Serve and enjoy!

name: Mexican Firing Squad Cocktail

ingredients.name: A few dashes of aromatic bitters
A slice of lime, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker (or Mason jar)
2. Fill with ice and shake well until chilled
3. Strain over ice
4. Garnish with a slice of lime

name: Limoncello Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: A piece of lemon zest, to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a cocktail shaker or mason jar with ice
2. Add all your ingredients and shake well until very chilled
3. Strain into a martini or cocktail glass, garnish with a piece of lemon zest and enjoy!

name: Garibaldi Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: A wedge of orange, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the orange juice to a blender and blitz for 1-2 minutes until it is frothy
2. Fill a highball glass with ice, pour over the Campari and top up with orange juice
3. Stir gently and finish with a wedge of orange on the rim to serve

name: Candy Corn Martini

ingredients.name: A handful of salty popcorn, chopped

instructions: 1. In a large mason jar with an airtight seal, cover the Candy Corn candies with vodka and seal
2. Set aside for 4-5 hours (or overnight) before straining into a clean glass jar
3. For the salty rim, brush the edge of your cocktail glass in maple syrup and dip into a saucer of the crushed popcorn until the rim is fully coated in salty popcorn piece.
4. Pour the infused vodka into the glass.
5. Gently pour the pineapple juice over the back of a spoon into the glass, allow it to float.
6. Stir the cream before pouring it into the glass the same way over the spoon, allowing it to float on top of the juice. Enjoy!

name: Italian Job Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: to garnish, a twist of grapefruit peel

instructions: 1. Fill a shaker (or mason jar) with ice and add all the ingredients
2. Shake briefly until cold and strain over ice into a highball or Tom Collins glass
3. Garnish with a twist of grapefruit peel

name: Mexican Coffee Cocktail

ingredients.name: A dusting of cocoa powder, cinnamon or cayenne pepper (optional)

instructions: 1. Pour the tequila and coffee liqueur into a mug
2. Top up with freshly brewed coffee
3. Garnish with whipped cream and dusting of your choice, if you want

name: Italian Sunrise Cocktail

ingredients.name: Half a slice of orange or lemon, to garnish

instructions: 1. Tip all the ingredients into a shaker (or a mason jar) and shake
2. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a slice of orange

name: Best Moscow Mule Recipe

ingredients.name: Lime wedge and mint leaves to garnish

instructions: 1. Pour the vodka, lime juice, and ginger beer into a copper mug or glass tumbler
2. Add ice and stir gently until combined
3. Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint

name: Italian Breeze Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: A wedge of pineapple to garnish, optional

instructions: 1. Tip all your ingredients into a shaker (or mason jar)
2. Add a good handful of ice, close and shake until well chilled
3. Strain and pour into your cocktail glass and serve with a wedge of pineapple garnish, if you like. Enjoy!

name: Hurricane Drink Recipe

ingredients.name: A slice of orange and a preserved cherry, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add all the ingredients into a shaker (or mason jar) with ice and shake until well-chilled
2. Strain into a hurricane or hi-ball glass over fresh ice
3. Garnish and enjoy

name: Hot Pumpkin Pie Cocktail

ingredients.name: Cup vanilla or pumpkin pie vodka
Strips of baked pumpkin pie crust to garnish, optional

instructions: 1. Add the Irish cream, vodka, and milk to a pot
2. Bring to the boil, then turn down the heat to a slow simmer
3. Stir through pumpkin puree and spices until mixed through
4. Ladle into warmed glass mugs
5. Dollop over some whipped cream
6. Dust with cinnamon
7. Serve with baked pumpkin pie crusts for dipping, if you like

name: Tequila Hot Chocolate

ingredients.name: Teaspoon cinnamon (Ceylon, if you can get your hands on it)

instructions: 1. Warm the milk gently in a medium heavy saucepan
2. Add the chocolate, cocoa powder, and sugar, stirring until the chocolate melts
3. Season with the spices and salt
4. Remove from the heat, and whisk in the tequila
5. Pour into a large mug and top with whipped cream
6. Dust with cinnamon and cayenne pepper

name: Orange Juice and Champagne Mimosa

ingredients.name: Orange juice (or any juice of your liking), freshly squeezed preferably

instructions: 1. Tilt your champagne flute and carefully pour in the sparkling wine, filling the glass to about halfway
2. Pour the orange juice on top to fill the glass and serve immediately to avoid the bubbles going flat

name: Easy Mexican Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: Lime wedges and olives, to garnish

instructions: 1. Make a small slit in the centre of a lime wedge and run the wedge around the rim of your martini glass before dipping it into a plate of kosher salt.
2. Fill a cocktail shaker (or mason jar) with ice, add the tequila, orange liqueur and dry vermouth with the lime and olive juice.
3. Shake well until cold.
4. Strain into your prepped Martini glass, garnish and serve.

name: Mexican Candy Cocktail

ingredients.name: A few drops of hot sauce

instructions: 1. For the Tajín, mix all the ingredients together in a bowl
2. Run a slice of lime around the rim of the glass
3. Dip the shot glass into the sweet Tajín mixture and twist to coat the rim
4. Fill a shaker (or mason jar) with ice and add all the remaining drink ingredients. Shake well until chilled
5. Strain the mixture into the shot glass
6. Garnish with a lime wheel and enjoy

name: Golden Dream Cocktail
instructions: 1. Tip all the ingredients into a shaker or mason jar
2. Add a handful of ice, close, and shake until well chilled
3. Strain and pour into your cocktail glass. Enjoy immediately!

name: Reverse Martini

ingredients.name: A piece of lemon peel, to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a large glass or jug halfway with ice and pour over all the ingredients
2. Stir until chilled and then strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass and garnish with lemon peel

name: Blood Orange Vodka Recipe

ingredients.name: Teaspoon simple syrup or maple syrup
A slice of blood orange, to garnish

instructions: 1. Take a handful of ice and add to your mason jar or shaker.
2. Pour all your ingredients over the ice
3. Cover and shake for 30 seconds, or until well chilled
4. Strain and pour into Collins or high ball glass, filled with a handful of ice
5. Garnish with a thin slice of orange, tucked down the side of the glass, and enjoy!

name: Blood Orange Margarita
instructions: 1. Wet the rim of a rocks glass or tumbler with a little juice
2. Dip it in a saucer of salt to coat
3. Fill the glass with ice and set aside
4. Half fill a shaker or mason jar with ice
5. Add all the ingredients and shake until icy cold
6. Strain into the glass
7. Garnish with a blood orange slice tucked onto the rim and enjoy super chilled

name: Baby Yoda Cocktail Ingredients
instructions: 1. Cut a kiwi fruit in half
2. Using a spoon, scoop out the flesh and add it to a cocktail shaker
3. Add a dash of simple syrup and muddle it together
4. Add the vodka and the ice
5. Shake until icy cold (about 30 seconds should do the trick)
6. Strain into a dressed-up coupe glass
7. Serve immediately

name: Watermelon Daiquiri

ingredients.name: A small wedge of watermelon, to garnish

instructions: 1. Put a handful of ice in a strong blender
2. Add the rum, watermelon liqueur, lime juice and watermelon cubes
3. Blitz until just smooth and serve in a cocktail or coupé glass
4. Garnish with a wedge of watermelon and sip away

name: Gin Watermelon Cocktail

ingredients.name: A small wedge of watermelon or lime, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add 2-3 cubes of ice to a strong blender along with rest of the ingredients and a little syrup to taste, if you like
2. Blitz until just smooth and serve in a cocktail or coupé glass
3. Garnish with a wedge of watermelon or lime and sip away

name: Recipe for Chocolate Martini
instructions: 1. Rim a cocktail glass with cocoa: Wet the rim by dipping it in a small dish of the chocolate liqueur, then dip or roll it in a dish of cocoa powder.
2. Pour the vodka, crème de cacao and chocolate liqueur into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
3. Shake vigorously.
4. Strain into the prepared glass and serve.

name: Mango Gin Cocktail

ingredients.name: A slice of lemon or mango, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the gin and juice to shaker or mason jar with a handful of ice
2. Shake vigorously to chill thoroughly
3. Strain into Collins glass filled with ice and top up with soda water and stir
4. Garnish with a slice of lemon or mango and enjoy!

name: Gin Bramble Cocktail

ingredients.name: Slice of lemon or a blackberry, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add a handful of ice to a cocktail shaker or mason jar and pour over the gin, lemon juice and syrup.
2. Shake briefly to allow ingredients to chill.
3. Fill a tumbler with ice and strain the mixture into it before drizzling over the crème de Mûre.
4. Allow it to bleed into the drink and garnish with the lemon and blackberries if they are in season.

name: Strawberry Gin Cocktail
instructions: 1. Muddle the strawberry and sugar in a mason jar or cocktail shaker using a rolling pin or wooden spoon
2. Meanwhile, add a handful of ice to a tall glass so it’s extra chilled
3. Add the gin, lemon juice and a handful of ice to the shaker or mason jar and shake well until frosted
4. Strain into the chilled glass over the ice
5. Top up with the club soda, stir and add a garnish of your choosing

name: Gin Passionfruit Cocktail
instructions: 1. In a mason jar, cocktail shaker or jug, mix together the gin, lemon juice, passion fruit pulp and seeds and the simple syrup.
2. Stir or shake well. Fill a highball or Collins glass with ice, pour in the gin mix and top up with soda water
3. Garnish with a lemon slice and extra passion fruit pulp for ultimate indulgence

name: John Collins Drink

ingredients.name: A Maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, to garnish

instructions: 1. Fill a Collins or hi-ball glass with ice and add the bourbon, lemon juice, and syrup and stir thoroughly to combine
2. Top up with soda water and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice

name: Michelada Mexican Beer Cocktail
instructions: 1. Mix the rim ingredients on a saucer. Rub the lime around the rim of the beer glass and then dip into the spicy salt
2. Pour all the remaining ingredients into the glass, tilt the glass and pour in the beer
3. Taste for seasoning and garnish with a lime wedge

name: Strawberry Margarita Recipe

ingredients.name: strawberries, destemmed and cut into quarters

instructions: 1. Add the strawberries to a mason jar or shaker along with the lime juice and crush or muddle them with the end of a rolling pin
2. Pour in the rest of the ingredients with a handful of ice
3. Shake vigorously to chill thoroughly before straining into chilled glasses
4. Scoop out any strawberry pulp stuck in the sieve and gently stir it into the cocktail
5. Slide the sliced strawberry onto the edge of the glass and serve

name: Orange Blossom Cocktail

ingredients.name: An orange wedge or peel, to garnish (optional)

instructions: 1. Fill a shaker or mason jar with a handful of ice
2. Pour over the gin, sweet vermouth and orange juice and shake until it’s properly chilled
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail or highball glass
4. Garnish with a wedge of orange and enjoy

name: Best Italian Manhattan

ingredients.name: A Maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, to garnish (optional)

instructions: 1. Pour all your ingredients into a mason jar or shaker along with a handful of ice
2. Shake until completely chilled
3. Strain into chilled cocktail or martini glass
4. Garnish with a cherry skewered with a slice of orange

name: Winter Manhattan Cocktail
instructions: 1. Pour all ingredients into a mason jar or cocktail shaker and fill with ice
2. Stir until completely chilled
3. Strain into chilled cocktail or martini glass
4. Garnish with a twist of lemon and enjoy

name: Apple Dream Cocktail

ingredients.name: Elderflower liqueur, and extra for muddling
An apple slice or blackberry to garnish

instructions: 1. Crush or muddle the apple in a shaker, mason jar or jug with a rolling pin with a dash of elderflower liqueur
2. Add a handful of ice then pour in the gin, elderflower liqueur and lemon juice
3. Shake briefly to chill and strain into a brandy glass with crushed ice
4. Top up with club soda and add the splash of blackberry liqueur
5. Garnish with a slice of apple

name: Tequila Sunrise Cocktail Recipe

ingredients.name: to garnish, a lime wedge or twist of orange

instructions: 1. Pour your tequila into a tumbler
2. Fill with a few cubes of ice and top up with orange juice
3. Pour the grenadine gently over a spoon, allowing it to sink down
4. Garnish and serve

name: 50/50 Martini Recipe

ingredients.name: A twist of lemon, to garnish (optional)

instructions: 1. Add all your ingredients to a mixing glass, mason jar or shaker and fill with ice
2. Stir until well-chilled
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
4. Garnish with a lemon twist and enjoy

name: Tom and Jerry Drink Recipe

ingredients.name: Hot milk, or water, or both to taste

instructions: 1. For the Tom & Jerry cocktail: Warm a heatproof glass or mug with boiling water. Discard the water before serving
2. Add the rum and brandy to the mug along with the batter and top with warm milk
3. Garnish with a grating of nutmeg and enjoy warm

name: Black Magic Cocktail
instructions: 1. To make up your black vodka, pour 2 oz of vodka into a mason jar, add a drop of black food coloring, seal and shake until its fully combined. If you want it darker, add another drop of coloring
2. Pour the vodka into collins or highball glass and add the grenadine
3. Add a handful of ice and top up with soda
4. Garnish with a cherry and enjoy!

name: Green Monster Drink
instructions: 1. Fill a highball or Collins glass with ice
2. Pour all the ingredients over the ice and stir
3. Garnish with a slice of lime and enjoy!

name: Watermelon Tequila Cocktail

ingredients.name: A slice of watermelon or watermelon balls, to garnish

instructions: 1. Add the watermelon to the blender and blitz until just smooth
2. Strain the watermelon through a sieve and pour into a shaker or mason jar
3. Add a handful of ice, along with the tequila, lime, syrup and salt
4. Shake briefly until chilled and strain into a cocktail or coupé glass
5. Skewer 3 melon balls onto a toothpick and pop them into the glass to garnish. So pretty!

name: Hugo Spritz

ingredients.name: A small handful of fresh mint (plus extra to garnish)

instructions: 1. Add bruised mint to the bottom of a large wine glass
2. Pour in the elderflower liqueur and gin (if you’re adding that kick), give it a stir and leave to infuse with the mint for a couple of minutes
3. Add ice, then pour in the prosecco and top it off with soda, giving it one more light stir
4. Garnish with an extra sprig of mint, and a slice of lime then serve

name: Caipirinha Ingredients

ingredients.name: An extra slice of lime for garnish

instructions: 1. Add the lime wedges and sugar to a double rocks glass
2. Muddle together
3. Fill the glass with ice, add the cachaça (or white rum) and stir
4. Pop a lime wheel onto the rim of the glass, if you’re feeling fancy
